ADMP fact is this would likely be a 15 or even 20 stock under even mediocre leadership And for the record all the shit the naysayers around here point out isnt secondguessing or hindsight there have literally been posters on these very boards calling Carlo out for their screwups and incompetence every step of the way Sad The real question though is can ADMP ever recover Realistically all bearbullshit aside with no active pipeline empty coffers Carlo still at the helm no launch in sight for Symjepi no revenue for at least 23 more Q because of that Zimhi tied up in legal troubles 99 of retails looking to bail million shares out looking to squash any momentum and a pathetic 2year history of going down even on good news can ADMP ever truly recover How can pumpers just blindly ignore all that Are they retarded Selling calls What
